website_summaries.verdict: Value mega-packs of tea lights that are ideal for lighting an event like an outdoor wedding or anniversary party. Bulk package will last a long time for general use.
pros: Traditional white candles made of 100% paraffin
Long burn time of over six hours
Smokeless wicks are made of 100% cotton
Available in packs of 100, 150, 200, and 300 candles
cons: According to some reviewers, the candles arrive in a bag, not in a neatly organized box as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Trim the wick for longer burning times
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful value. I was hesitant to order these because of a few bad reviews but did it anyway knowing Amazon always takes care of unhappy buyers. They are nicely packaged and arrived ed right on time. I will tell you that I lit a few of these right out of the box and they only burned for about 3-3 1/2 hours. Then I decided to trip the wick in half and they burned about 6 1/2 hours. There is no smell and the burn is clean, no smoke. I have given these a much deserved 5 Star review.
customer_reviews.author: LucyLouie

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, clean burn
customer_reviews.text: I Have been using these candles in my "hippy heater" in my bedroom at night for about a year now. I burn 4 at a time and they put off a good amount of heat in there!! They typically burn for a solid 6 hours sometimes more. I start them before I go to bed and depending on when I wake up, sometimes they're still burning!! They burn so clean, not soot or smoke. I keep reordering these candles. Won't trust anything else. I've attached photos of the heater including the interior where you can see no black soot.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Sciortino

customer_reviews.title: A good price, but the photo they have posted is ...
customer_reviews.text: The candles do not arrive in a neatly packaged form; they're all dumped into a bag, and while in transit, the candles get all bent from every side. A good price, but the photo they have posted is misleading. Tea light candles that are dented do not burn as long, because the indentation prevents the even flow of wax fluid. When the wick burns out, you can clearly see the unburnt leftover wax. I burned 20 of them, and they all varied in their burning time: From 3.5 to 4.25 hours. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chirp

customer_reviews.title: The price is good, at least
customer_reviews.text: These candles arrived with about half of them smashed. The holders appear to have been mashed together, and as a result they don't all fit the candle openings correctly. The burn time seems very uneven with these. Sometimes its 2 hours, sometimes its over 6 hours. The wax doesn't always melt evenly as it should. The price is good, at least.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Candles!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived beautifully packaged just like the picture. They burned brightly for over 6 hours. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jim F

customer_reviews.title: Search is over for quality tea candles
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying tea candles for years. Almost without exception they've turned out to be cheap wax in a thin metal holder. These candles are absolutely amazing. The firstt hing I did (after admiriing the wax) was time the length they burned. Six to seven hours is accurate, and some have burned longer than that. The packaging was perfect (aside from the usual Amazon over-doing of it) and I won't have to look for a tea candle again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: RIP-OFF
customer_reviews.text: We burn tea lights daily, almost all throughout the year. When I saw these were 'long lasting' (6-7 hours) at a better price than the product I usually buy, I jumped. When they started going out after 2-ish hours, at first, I thought I had made a mistake. But now, after a couple of weeks and using over a dozen of these little candles and I'm confident in saying they only burn anywhere from 2-3 hours (see photo) - certainly not anywhere close to the 6-7 hours as promised. Don't buy these candles, they are a rip-off in nice packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burns long time but not a very bright flame
customer_reviews.text: These candles DO burn quite awhile but they are DIM. I don't know why but they are very dim. Also, they don't look like they are paraffin as described. They look like the soy tealights that are available locally. VERY DISAPPOINTED !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kinglet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought those I shopped around between the dollar store and other people selling candles and what it came down to if you get them from the dollar store and you add up the amount of time loss for theirs it's nothing compared to these to get the equivalent of these at the dollar store I would have had to spend $100 at the dollar store so I ended up getting this box and I've never been happier I go through them like there's no tomorrow and they so far have lasted me so freaking long I still have half a box I use them about everyday at least two at a time
customer_reviews.author: Tyler grundmeyer

customer_reviews.title: in perfect conditions, no breeze in a scent diffuser they ...
customer_reviews.text: These are described as burning 6-7 hours...Well, in perfect conditions, no breeze in a scent diffuser they last about 1 hour. Very bad purchase!! Too heavy to return for the price that Amazon would reimburse me...I GOT STUCK!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Morgan

customer_reviews.title: All Other Tealights Are Forever Ruined
customer_reviews.text: This is a great economy buy but I go through tea lights like crazy in my work. So, I tried going cheaper after last purchasing these. I despised all other tea lights because I kept comparing them to these. If you want tea lights that are going to burn strong for a long time or to use in a setting where ambience is extremely important, these are the best. If you just need cutesy little tea lights then you are probably fine going cheaper. Me, personally, I'm really stuck on these. They even photograph better on my social media and YouTube channel.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst Angel Light

customer_reviews.title: Better than I was expecting...
customer_reviews.text: So I don't know if I missed somewhere in the description but these tealights are larger than the tealights that I'm used to having. I placed this product (on the left) next to the tealights I was expecting (on the right) but I'm actually really happy with these because they do burn a lot longer (about double the time) of traditional tealights. The only problem would be with more shallow tealight holders (if you have them, they may stick out over the top). I use these in mason jars and taller tealight holders so actually they are a lot more effective with the longer burn time. I'm very happy with this product and they're definitely better than I expected :)
customer_reviews.author: kailinhiggi

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble with cheap tea lights I got at a craft store, they didn't last very long and when partially burned, if you tried to re-light them the wicks would burn up and then they were done for with wax left over. these work great! long burn time and no problem snuffing and re-lighting for multiple uses. great value.
customer_reviews.author: eclectic listener

customer_reviews.title: too big to fit in our standard tea light holes on the prayer table
customer_reviews.text: We just openind the box to restock the prayer table and these are too big for the holes. Unfortunately we missed the return date by 1 day and are stuck with too large of tea lights. I wish the diameter was a standard size on all of these as this makes ordering difficult. Diemnsions on the description would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Park City Community Church

customer_reviews.title: Great, except they have a scent
customer_reviews.text: These candles came neatly packaged, the wax seems good quality, they burn nicely and for a long time - all as promised. HOWEVER, they are marketed and labeled as unscented but they definitely have a smell. Its not strong and I cant name the smell - but I smelled it as soon as I opened the shipping box. I hoped that when they burnt I wouldn't notice the smell but after leaving the room and walking back in it is definitely noticeable. I'm annoyed to return these because otherwise they are great, but other tea lights have actually been unscented and these are definitely not.
customer_reviews.author: KarlyM

customer_reviews.title: Nice find!
customer_reviews.text: For the money and the length of how these burn, we're glad to have found these. We're on our second box. These easily burn for 6.5 to 7 hours for us. We love these. Little bit of flake on them when you take them out due to shipping but really long burn. The wicks are good also - they don't curl when first lit. Only issue is we did notice they do leave a little more of a residue on a front window where we have a 10 candled Christmas set lit. But that's an extreme case based on 10 candles lit right by a window every night during the Holiday. I totally recommend these based on reliability and affordability.
customer_reviews.author: TnT

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!  Died out in an hour or two!
customer_reviews.text: Utterly failed to last beyond an hour or two. Needed them to be long-lasting over-night for flea traps -- at least the 6 hours promised! Goin' back for sure.
customer_reviews.author: syntax

customer_reviews.title: don’t last as long as they claim but still good value under $20
customer_reviews.text: Update: candles last only four to five hours. Still a good purchase under $20. —/ Good long lasting candles. No scent at all and not soy based but you get good a amount of tea lights for the money, so decent value. Only issues are half of mine came busted and squished so I removed a star. It doesn’t impair efficacy I don’t think. Also the price went up a couple dollars so I’m not sure I’d subscribe to them at the current price of over $20!
customer_reviews.author: CC✨👩🏻‍🍳✨

customer_reviews.title: These tealights are perfect I burn 6 every night they burn for a ...
customer_reviews.text: These tealights are perfect I burn 6 every night they burn for a least 6 hours I've had some burn for 8 hours. I will keep buying them a great value. Ordered 2 packages of 200 tealight candles were delivered in 2 shipments, the first was 2 packs of 100 shrink wrapped not in a box, the second was the bundle of 200 candles shrink wrapped not in a box. Description says new better packaging wrapped and in a box, I did not receive that. I will continue to purchase these candles as I burn 6 every night and the price is good. Maybe when I place my next order I receive the new improved packaging.10/15/16
customer_reviews.author: frogcoach

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get scared off by ALL the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about ordering these which is why I decided to take a shot despite the bad reviews and tried the 100 count first. Once I go through these I plan to buy the 200 count in the future. These arrived on time, and in nice neat packaging, no odor and every single one appear in perfect condition. I would recommend to anyone and will be ordering these again. 12/30/2017
customer_reviews.author: A. Negron

customer_reviews.title: Will not burn properly! CHEAP JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are horrible and being returned! They hardly burn and go out completely with an hour and won’t relight. Cheap junk! I’d rather pay more to get better quality. Buyer beware... rip off!
customer_reviews.author: licorice lucy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The candles are fine. My disappointment is that I specifically ordered 345 candles for $20.45. Instead my order was arbitrarily changed to 200 candles. Well I am certain that that is a good price, I definitely ordered more candles and only had 200 sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Skinny wick - Not much light
customer_reviews.text: They came perfectly packaged, but when I lit the first one, it barely put out light. I lit a second candle. Same. I examined them carefully and the wicks are skinny compared to the tea lights I would normally get from Pier One. When I put them side-by-side to compare, there was a marked difference. The length of the wick before I lit them was identical. So...I wouldn't order these. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: MN Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good mini-candles
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. They produce a very nice flame with a lot of light and no smoke. The bottom surface of the aluminum cup is flat so they don't wobble at all. A straight burn will last 6-7 hours, as advertised. The only ding I would give these is that the aluminum cup is a little too wide for the wick, so about 15% of the wax is leftover after the wick is consumed. I hate throwing away good wax so what I do is let the wax harden, then bend the sides of the cup in to break up the remaining wax and add it to one of my bigger jar candles.
customer_reviews.author: Tokeo Gibson

customer_reviews.title: JULY 2019 - GREAT PACKAGING
customer_reviews.text: Just received them... after reading some really bad reviews (from a long time ago) but also readi g some good ones that were more current, I decided to roll the dice. Haven't burned them yet, BUT look at the packaging... EXACTLY as promised... arrived in perfect condition judging from the top row. Will update if I can after burning... certainly can't be much worse than most of the stuff I find around town that doesn't last any time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Canyon Doug

customer_reviews.title: Costs.. Be prepared!
customer_reviews.text: This is an update on these candles, hurricane season is here be prepared always use an holder bigger then your candle. Aloha from Honolulu Hawaii. I order it for I like lightning candles around the house and perfectly honest I thought I was getting a 1 inch in height but instead got it in a inch in half or more? BEST mistake ever and do you know why? The cost for this in the store and if it comes in this height COST! Use it for weddings, anniversaries and around the yard for that romantic dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Charlette A. P. Kealoha

customer_reviews.title: Other than that they are good and im about to order another box
customer_reviews.text: There was one that did not have a wick. Other than that they are good and im about to order another box..Lets hope they all have wicks lol
customer_reviews.author: Kristie L.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Shipping Practices
customer_reviews.text: Candles last as long as advertised. However, these shipped in a carton not much thicker than heavy poster board. This may work if there is no rough handling. These were all on one side at the top. Appears to have been dropped. The first shipment of these came without issue. I cannot say for sure, but if my memory is correct, these came with other items packed in a corrugated box. I have a few holders, were these will not fit. It is not a big problem, I just like businesses to be professional in all aspects. I will order again because of long burning time.
customer_reviews.author: Orbis

customer_reviews.title: It has been increasingly more difficult to find good tealight candles
customer_reviews.text: It has been increasingly more difficult to find good tealight candles. These are amazing! It's silly to get excited about tealight candles, I know. But, lately all of the ones I have been buying online or even in stores have been cheap imitation versions of the kind that used to be available and often half the size. These are full sized, burn long and evenly. The price can't be beat. I won't buy any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: K. B.

customer_reviews.title: These tea lights are just as advertised & just what I wanted : )
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised! Received them yesterday & tried them out last night. These are somewhat taller than standard tea lights (but not wider) so they do burn longer. I ordered plain white, unscented, so I can use them for quite a few things. Check the listing for details. I'd gladly buy them again. They were a fair price, especially since they are taller, so they last longer. It worked beautifully in my decorative little spinner topped candle holder, which spins from the candle heat! Hope this review helps : )
customer_reviews.author: MeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Candles such as this are a nice quality of life thing.  At a good price.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great price. The box they come in is a nice size, which allows me to store them well and pull them out when I want. I like having candles burning in the house. These have a good long burn life to them. I put them in glass with a small amount of water around them. Light em up, and let em go! Creates a very warm feel to the house at night when we are just chilling out. LED light bulbs have really weird colors, so we have these and a couple lamps when its chill and relax time. Very nice quality of life thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C

customer_reviews.title: Love these tealights!
customer_reviews.text: These really do burn for hours and yes mine have burned for 6 hours at a time! some longer. I bought these for emergencies because I live in C.A. where our PG&E can be shut off at any time and for several days at a time. These are a must for my household! and I needed to know that these tealights would actually burn for 6 hours at a time in order to be prepared for 2 weeks at a time or longer. They burned as long as they stated and in some cases longer than six hours. I will purchase these again and I recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second Time Around, Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering these increadable tea light candles. They last at least 6 hours, most of the ones 1 have burned lasted 6.5 to 7 hours, we burn them at night in our she shed! How wonderful to not have to change out candles every hour . so worth the money, Great box, securely packaged! Wont buy From anywhere else anymore. So pleased!! And sometimes there is enough to light the candles up if blown out early!! I didn't mark a 5 star for smell, because they have no sent, and we didn't want one, so thats perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Quite a find!
customer_reviews.text: I have been an aromatherapy aficionado for decades! My favorite and most economic methodology is scented wax cubes (Wal-Mart is the least expensive) and tealights. There's not much one can say about tealights. But, I will say this... these are effective and last twice as long since they are twice is "deep" as any other tealight I've ever purchased. I wish I'd discovered them long ago. They are a bargain and a half!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Butler

customer_reviews.title: Follow Directions
customer_reviews.text: To get the full life out of these candles, you need to trim the wick as stated in the directions! If the wick is too long, your flame will burn hotter, making the wax evaporate much faster. This is actually good advice for any candle. A quick snip before lighting is all it takes, small extra step for longer burn. Great purchase and good to have stocked up for hurricane season!
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Heckler

customer_reviews.title: best "tea" candles I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I don't give a lot of 5-star reviews, but .... The other positive reviewers are correct about this: It's a great product and ay at a great price point. The candles come carefully packed in a box with each layer sealed. (Evidently they came in a big bag before, jumbled together, but no more.) Yes, some dents occasionally in each one, but easily corrected by a finger push on the metal casing. Not something anyone would notice. Every one lasts at least 7 hours. I've never had a failure in months of use. Bought my second box today, and plan on ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I love burning candles but I hate having to replace the tea light after several hours. I put these to the test and lit them at 6pm and the last one burned until 3am. The others burned out betweem the 2am and 3am hour. This is perfect for me! I don't smell a scent from these and they fit all my candle holders (the ones made for tea lights and votives of course) and they came packaged in the same box as the picture on Amazon. Great product and I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: M.ScottTop Contributor: Fragrance

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed. T The box delivered exceptionally well-packaged/secure. Not a single candle defect from what I can see. I am just over 4 hrs test-burning the first one for your reviewing pleasure 😘 and its still burning bright with a third of the wax remaining...seemingly true to the 6-hr claim. Mine came in a milky cream color, but when the wax heats up it goes clear. I imagine this would be a cool feature if u were using these to float or other decoration. I will DEF be purchasing this again, although it'll be a while, as slow as these burn...hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Strange Fish

customer_reviews.title: Long burn!
customer_reviews.text: Lost power the other day for a few hours, and afterward I was looking for some long burning candles to keep as emergency lighting. These candles were the right price for sure, and after testing recently, they have a VERY LONG burn time as promised. However, they accomplish this in two ways. One by the type of fuel used, and two by using a very thin wick. What this means is that the flame isn't very large, but once your eyes get used to the dark, they're adequate. Make sure you use a tea light holder, as after a few hours, the entire candle will liquefy as it burns.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Reluctanrt to even give it one star
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst candles I have ever purchased. Do not purchase these as they do not burn properly as the wick burns out and you are left with 75% of the candle left and it won't relight. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST tealights for tart burners!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute BEST tealights for tart burners! I have been using a tealight tart burner for years (decades) and have tried a zillion different tealights. These are the absolute best and I'll never buy another brand now. I'm on my 2nd case of these and I love them because they're bigger (taller) than standard tealights, so they burn longer. They also burn cleanly and evenly. In the two cases I've purchased, I have not had one dud! These come beautifully packaged, shrinkwrapped in a sturdy box that prevents them from getting dinged or bent. Seriously, once you try these you'll never go back to what you were using before.
customer_reviews.author: Blues Hammer

customer_reviews.title: They burn long and clean with no scent, and the price is more than reasonable.
customer_reviews.text: We got these to use with our little fragrance oil burners in the basement and kitchen. They do a clean, long burn with no smell. I use a fragrance oil burner in the basement, because I can't stand the smell of a basement, even a cemented one, and my laundry area is down there and these work great. They burn long, which means I don't have to run down to the basement every hour or so to change the candle in the burner. They also work nice on the outside table when we want to sit out, need a bit of light, but don't want to attract a bunch of bugs, plus they're a great value price-wise.
customer_reviews.author: DeannaG

customer_reviews.title: Long burning, but dim.
customer_reviews.text: These are alright candles, but I think I'll try another brand when these run out. They come in little metal cups, and don't burn very bright. I got them for two reasons, the first is ambient lighting in the evening when the mood strikes, and to also have for power outages. For ambient lighting when you don't want something super bright they're okay, but if you think they're something good to have if the power goes out, think again. Not terrible, but not very impressive either.
customer_reviews.author: Julie D

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the tea lights. They do last a long time minimum 6 hours almost 8... way longer than the standard 3-4 hour size. Came nicely packed inside a box. Some of the tea lights were slightly dented, but not an issue because I put them inside a candle holder. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: irene2011

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Tealights  individually packed in a box
customer_reviews.text: I have burned tealights for years, and these are the finest I have every found. These burn completely even & odorless to the point no wax is left in the aluminum holder. The color of these is a light & beautiful ivory white. Ignore the photos & old reviews as these are NOT packaged loose in a bag, are indeed neatly packaged in a cardboard box all separated by dividers just like the listing photo. All 200 tealights arrived in absolute perfect condition. Also, an unbeatable deal as these do burn between 6-7 hours. I really hope they keep making these & don't change a thing! GREATEST tealights!
customer_reviews.author: Kundalini

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting candles
customer_reviews.text: Product is as stated. My shipment was on point!!! In the past I had ordered these candles (100), and just recently started using them when the weather started getting cold. There’s just something about the ambiance of candles when they light up a room. I went through them so fast. This time I decided to purchase (200); the value for the amount of candles received is exceptional. I recently received them, and began using them right away. I am once again not disappointed. They are long-lasting, they do not expel any unpleasant smoke fumes and the tin containers that they sit in are durable. Thank you once again Stonebriar and Amazon for your service. Another pleased customer.
customer_reviews.author: Loimonet

customer_reviews.title: Not 6-7 hours as advertised but still good.
customer_reviews.text: Indeed taller than standard tea lights but as far as longer than average burn time, I would NOT say 6-7 hours. That’s just not true. The wick isn’t longer or stronger than I can tell. They don’t have a scentless and they did come with as little damage to the rims as possible. All and all I’m happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: These were great votive candles. I normally don't like the little silver cup votives since they don't last very long, but these will last a whole event INCLUDING the time it takes a team to light them all so they are ready when guests walk in! Mine lasted 6 hours easily, and for the most part didn't spill into the silver votive cup I was using, so clean up was easier and faster! Out of the whole box of 100 only 2 were dented- I could have used if I had to, but didn't need to.
customer_reviews.author: MsOak

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE! GREAT CANDLE!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a different tea light candle brand when I started using my oil diffuser. They were $16 for 100 that only lasted 3hrs. When I started running low I was going to order more, then came along these. I figured why not? I love that they last more than twice as long. They come packed tightly in a box. I am about to order my 3rd box. The previous 2 boxes I've ordered have come in perfect condition. Not one cracked candle. From what I've looked at on Amazon, these are by far the best tea lights for the price AND for the quality. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Powell

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure if I should buy these candles based on a few very negative reviews but I took a chance and I’m glad I did. They arrived on time and in very good condition. When I burned the first candle (just one to start) I trimmed the wick as one reviewer suggested and it burned for 6-7 hours without a problem. I’m very pleased with this purchase. I’ve attached pictures so you can see how they looked when I opened the box and the result of my first burning.
customer_reviews.author: Wally Wells

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great candle to put on the shelf with other emergency supplies. If power goes out for extended period of time you will need more than just a flashlight for light. These are in nice little aluminum cups which keep wax and flame confined for safety. I would still recommend you put the candle on an aluminum pie plate or just a dish of some sort for added safety. Just like any open flame be very careful where you set your candle so you don't start fire. One more tip make sure you put several packs of matches on your emergency shelf too.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a long time as advertised. Quality is mostly consistent so far
customer_reviews.text: I tried and used about 1/3 of the box, most candles lasted about 5-7hrs as advertised. Quality is consistent so far. I only had 1-2 with damaged wick during burning so far. Good for keeping the tea warm for most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Anna G

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure what to expect based on other reviews. Tealights came packed as shown in picture, 4 tightly packed dual layer packets inside cardboard box. tried 2 tealights, one inside "hippy heater" and one free standing. Trimmed about 1/3 of the wick on both. Both tealights lasted 6.5 hours. I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: GKP

customer_reviews.title: Definitely long-burning.
customer_reviews.text: I saw other reviews criticizing the packaging; mine arrived in a cardboard box, and there was no damage at all. Maybe the manufacturer changed it at some point? Anyway, if you trim the wicks short before lighting, you can definitely get over 7 hours of burn time. I use these around the house on a few oil warmers I have, and they're fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Weezill

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and great presentation!
customer_reviews.text: These tea lights are amazing! They are unscented and they last a very long time which is great for my wax burner. They came neatly packaged in a box which was a plus for storage. Also very big in size for longer burn time. We got ours to burn for 7 hours!! Will definitely purchase more once I'm out. They have a customer for life with us!
customer_reviews.author: AngelaMarieInNC

customer_reviews.title: Great for emergencies and other times when you need a 6-7 hour candle.
customer_reviews.text: Bought exclusively for the emergency tote. Had to test one to see if it burned as advertised. Without trimming the wick, mine burned 6-6.5 hours. That's probably 2-3x as long as traditional tea lights. I'm sure it would burn longer if trimmed, but then it would also give off less light as a tradeoff. Would be great for weddings or parties, too, I would think. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Little Candle
customer_reviews.text: These large "tea lights" really do burn for 5-7 hours, evenly, and brightly. I love these. I've purchased so many crap candles online that either wouldn't burn well or at all and these aren't like that at all. These are easy to get going and stay lit until they're done. You can, (unlike regular tea candles) light, put out and then relight these candles. Once I'm done with these 300, I'll for sure be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: Holy Mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: The best tealight candles I've found
customer_reviews.text: These candles are an excellent value for the money. They light more quickly than candles I've purchased in the past, and the packaging they come in means they aren't bent or falling out of the metal holders. I'll for sure buy this brand again when I've burned all of these. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JanelleG

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Lights
customer_reviews.text: As long as your votive will hold a thicker candle, these are ideal. I was tired of replacing standard sized tea lights almost every time we used them. With these, they last several lightings. This is the second time I purchased them and really think they are the best.
customer_reviews.author: CautiousBuyer

customer_reviews.title: 6+ hour duration.......not so.
customer_reviews.text: If you are needing a tea candle that will last for 6+ hours, this is not your candle. I have now purchased these for two years in a row and in BOTH uses the candles made it only 2.5-3.5 hours. This on it own is a long time for a tea candle, but when they are marketed so proudly as a 6+ hour candle and they don't perform that is false advertising. Stonebriar, change your marketing or make a candle that supports your marketing
customer_reviews.author: NCBoiler

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Last As Long As Described
customer_reviews.text: We did a test burn today while we were around the house, and the candle did not last as long as anticipated (6-7 hours). Our candle lasted 5 1/2 hours. So if you were hoping to get much more than that, I think the tea lights will have to be switched out of the votives.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Weak flames. . . .
customer_reviews.text: These tealight candles are long-burning. That's the upside. The downside is they give off a very weak flame. If you are using these candles strictly for just aesthetic purposes, then they are good. But if you, like me, use tealight candles to keep your actual teapots warm, then don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: The Silent Gondolier

customer_reviews.title: Long life, low odor tea candles, as promised
customer_reviews.text: These tea candles are exactly as advertised, long burning with next to no scent (just a slight wax odor, no way around that). I would love to be able to buy them as candle only, without the little metal containers they come in, for less waste, but I have found a couple of uses for the metal containers. They are good for holding incense cones while they burn and for making very small silicone (or whatever material) molds.
customer_reviews.author: M. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Longest lasting tea light I’ve bought.
customer_reviews.text: These candles last longer than any other I’ve bought!! I’ve watched the time. Everyday....at least 6.5 hours! Can’t beat that, and the price! Definite recommend and buy again !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Best price on the site. They burn for about 6 hours. I found other boxes of them on here for more money and fewer tea lights. I looked through old purchases to find these again. Worth every penny and the box lasts forever for an avid tea light user. They’re definitely deeper than the bag of tea lights you buy at yankee. And the wax quality is smooth, not the weirdly grainy type you get at discount stores.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea lights around
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these tea lights for about 2 yrs now and I must say BEST candles I have ever used. They are true to the burning time. I have seen some burn past 8 to 9 hours. The wax melts evenly with none left after burning. They add a great ambiance to any room. I used them outside on my deck and they add that perfect night lighting touch! So happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Prittyricki

customer_reviews.title: Something Changed for the Worse
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for a while now. My last shipment was different from previously received candles. The tealight cans are noticeably shorter (0.2" roughly) and have slightly less wax. Worse, however, they don't fully burn the wax in the tealight. It seems they must have changed the wicks. The old product used to burn up all the wax. Now there's probably 10% - 20% of the wax that remains unburned. Won't be buying these gain.
customer_reviews.author: Bhouse

customer_reviews.title: Worse tea lights ever!!
customer_reviews.text: My first review ever on Amazon. WORSE tea lights EVER! Many of them arrived bent (the aluminum holder). Also, described as “6-hour” tea lights - they actually burnt 1-1.15 at best. They also leaked from the bottom - never had tea lights like that before. You’re better off going to Target or IKEA - just as inexpensive (or maybe even cheaper) and never had issues with theirs!
customer_reviews.author: ingrida

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: These barely burn. Don't know what their wax formula is, but it's terrible. Paid a lot more for what looked like similar candles at Pottery Barn. Figured these would be a cheaper alternative. Needless to say, I just ordered a bunch more from Pottery Barn. These are useless.
customer_reviews.author: R. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best tea light candles I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: Promptly delivered and good deal for the price. Candles were neatly arranged inside the box. The candles are taller than normal ones, last for 5-6 hours and burn completely. I light candles to clean the air around the entrance of my apartment where everything I cook seem to accumulate, becomes stale over time and give a shock to the senses when we enter!! So I really appreciate a good candle burning at the entrance of my apartment (along with my diffuser for good sense). Thank you for making fabulous, affordable candles.. will buy more if the same product and offer continues.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder

customer_reviews.title: Love these tea lights
customer_reviews.text: I love these tea lights. They burn for 6-7 hours, and they burn completely-no wax left in the metal cups when they extinguish themselves. The candles arrived very quickly and neatly packed in a box. These have spoiled me for ever buying any other kind.
customer_reviews.author: H. Sitler

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Product Name
customer_reviews.text: These candles are perhaps the best tea candles that I could have purchased. They do in fact burn for a long time. Most of the other tea candles that I have encountered in my life seem cheap, run out quick, and seem flimsy. However, I was not afraid of my home burning down with these and they lasted a good amount of time. I can recommend for a romantic room lighting. I am not sure what other uses they might before other than some good aesthetics but I would recommend for whatever you have in mind. I would purchase again, but the set of 100 will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great tealights, amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of the tea lights from Cost Plus for years now, but I ended up buying these when the tea lights from Cost Plus weren't available online. Since I had a couple of the Cost Plus candles left, I burned several of them along with some of these to compare their longevity. The Stonebriar candles lasted just as long as the Cost Plus ones, if not longer! They're a great value and very high quality -- I'm sold! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Miriel12

customer_reviews.title: LONGEST BURNING
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute BEST, longest lasting, bang for your buck Tea light candles I've ever found!!! They are literally twice the size (depth) of your typical tea light. I'm going to try to upload some pics. Never buying then from anywhere else again. Very happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I'm always on the look out for a good tea light candle. I've tried many over the years - some good, some not so good. I can say that this tea light lasts 4 to 5 hours and all the wax is used up. It burns evenly; the wick is placed directly in the center and stays there. I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Wed645

customer_reviews.title: Lasts like no other
customer_reviews.text: This candle is twice the size of a normal tea light candle but that's exactly what I needed for my warm oil diffuser so glad to found this in amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mulong Taklong

customer_reviews.title: No Scent, Lasts longer
customer_reviews.text: I origianlly ordered a different brand and they were "4-6 hour" and would burn out after 2 or 3. I purchased these and they actually do burn for about 5 hours. Love them for nighttime tea lights - no funky smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Johnson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful , they last a long time which is great and they warm my warmers up better for more scent. They are scentless so no over power smell to compete with. They came in a nice box no damage and quick. The price was great and there is so many of them they will last a long time, especially with the holidays coming up.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Moody

customer_reviews.title: Great tea lights
customer_reviews.text: These are great tea lights. They are pretty thick, but still fit inside anything designed for tea lights and they burn FOREVER. Well, maybe not forever, but several hours. I use them mostly for wax melts, but they also do great just as a light as well. My favourite part - there have been no duds! Sometimes I get tea lights that will stop burning after a short time and no amount of relighting will work, but I have not had any problems like that with these babies!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Tea Lights
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than the smaller tea lights. You can blow these out & relight them the next day. They really do last at least 6 hours or more.
customer_reviews.author: Deege

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: The seller's sales method is too clever. He changed the container with a slightly wide and short size into a narrow and high container to hold candles. The photo display seems to have more capacity than the short size! But in fact, there is only a little bit difference ... This will make you feel that the price is really good. Alas, I was cheated again.
customer_reviews.author: Evonne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tealight Candle
customer_reviews.text: The tealights arrived perfectly, not a one out of place or damaged. We did a trial run before the holidays and lit a dozen of them. They burned evenly for a solid 6 hours, before they started to flicker and slow down. As with any candle, always trim the wick first before lighting-every single time. Makes a huge difference in how the candle will burn. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: blondie2011

customer_reviews.title: Lasts 6-8 hours and fragrance free
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They actually burn 6 to 8 hours. Standard tea light only last a few hours. They are also fragrance free. Great for entertaining as they last longer and still provide the comfort of knowing the flame is contained and will self extinguish if forgotten (not recommended). Excellent for anything that uses a tealight that you want to enjoy longer.
customer_reviews.author: Leeto

customer_reviews.title: Re order not the same as the first order
customer_reviews.text: The first order was in good quality and lasted as advertised (6-7 hrs) however the re-order was not the same quality and candles were smaller than the first order. A bit disappointed on the 2nd order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Larger than most tea light candles
customer_reviews.text: I use tea light candles often for melting scented wax. Most tea light candles are dinky and last maybe 2 hours. These last a full 5 hours. That combined with the fact that there is 200 in a pack make these a great value. I also recommended this product to my inlaws whom are tired of paying $15 for a 20 pack of tea lights from the local convenience store.
customer_reviews.author: Rougue

customer_reviews.title: wow I like em
customer_reviews.text: I only bought these because Walmart was out of the unbelievably cheap tea lights I usually buy. I really thought I was getting soaked with the purchase price of these.. I think the ARE actually just that much nicer. they are taller & have nicer wicks.. the hilarious part(to me) is the Walmart candles werean upgrade from the tea lights I used to buy!
customer_reviews.author: gregory.a.. clewell

customer_reviews.title: Apparently it's unaminimous
customer_reviews.text: Another rave review about these tealights isn't really needed, but I still wanted to rate these candles based on my experience with them. These tealights burn bright and have no sinking wick. It's always annoyed me with other tealights in the past when the wick burns out before all of the candle wax has been exhausted. That has not happened with these and I really appreciate that. As for the claim that they burn for six hours, well they do. Exactly as claimed. Absolutely, hands down, the best tealights I've ever used. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the candles do burn between six and seven hours/
customer_reviews.text: the candles burned as long as stated/ they arrived on time/due to my dog, photo of package with taken and sent to me of where the package was,when delivered/ Great Service/ thanks again/will keep reordering from you !/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful packaging, came in a box and the candles are wrapped. Each tealight I have used so far has lasted at least 6 hours. They burn clean and love them. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The only tealight I'll buy
customer_reviews.text: I like to burn tealights. A lot. I light them when I'm cooking, or sitting at my desk, or when we're eating dinner. One box of these lasted me a couple years. I just purchased my second box. These burn super cleanly, with no sputtering or smoking. They also seem to burn a nice, long time.
customer_reviews.author: CorriePDX

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: These tealight candles are as stated in the advertisement. I use them with the Himalayan salt candle holders. I am a paper crafter and find these candles to hold up to the many hours I am crafting. The arrived as promised. They are well packaged for shipping. I will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good quantity to have on hand, great prices.
customer_reviews.text: Burns long and clean. Multiple uses. You will only appreciate the quality if you have ever used cheap ones. Burn oil, potpourri, candle fixtures, tea light holders, holiday decorations, even used when power went out! I keep a box on hand. Have also used as inexpensive gifts say put 10 in a box with a couple tea lights holders- hey I even sprang for the heavy $0.99 colorful holders from Ikea put in a Dollar Store gift bag and you have an instant gift for coworkers or dinner party host...BAM!
customer_reviews.author: Daw

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't do as claimed
customer_reviews.text: My first box I got was great - nicely packaged and they burned pretty consistently for around 5-6 hours. This next batch must have been a bad one because I am on my 17th candle and the burn time is averaging 2.5 hours. Don't know if I will try this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging with the 300 candle order
customer_reviews.text: Box is flimsy, box was delivered open and destroyed. All candles were crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin

customer_reviews.title: Gigantic candles serve their purpose.
customer_reviews.text: These are candles. They serve their purpose quite well. I've been able to get 6-8 hours out of most candles although some burn short at around 4 hours. this is fine. Candles are larger than average tea light candles because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Teara Thurmond

customer_reviews.title: Best tea lights I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: After using these tea lights, I realize I have been getting ripped off for years buying the ones where they burn out after a few hours! These tea lights truly burn for hours. They don’t spill over and this is a real find! Thank you for the great product
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: They leak!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but 30% of these leak molten wax from the bottom of the aluminum cup. You may be thinking of writing a review too when you're cleaning up the pool of paraffin from whatever they were held in. Again. Kind of a drag. Not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: bobsyouruncle

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Lighting Power
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I first bought these tea candles if it will really last 6-7 hours as described. Happy to say that yes, it really last 7+ hours! I'm so used to buying the cheap tea candles that only last about 3 hours but Stonebriar candles is the best. Won't use any other kind but Stonebriar tea candles.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria D Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Burns as advertised 😊
customer_reviews.text: These burn as long as advertised with a wick trim before use. Be aware they are taller than the average tea light candle when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: True clean candles
customer_reviews.text: I like them because they are Clean no scent candles, They last long as advertised, no smock or sticky film on my windows. I use this candles 24hour to pray In front my divine merch picture on the wall. I will buy this candles again and again. The best so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

product_meta.title: Stonebriar 6-7 Hour Long Burning Unscented Tea Light Candles, 200 Pack, White
product_meta.description: Size:200 PackPackage contains 200 quality sustainable palm wax unscented white tea light candles with an extended burn time of 6 to 7 hours. Our wicks are lead free and 100% cotton, and each candle comes in it’s own aluminum tin. These quality tea light candles can be used with any decor whether it be for a beautiful centerpiece for the holidays, an upscale romantic restaurant setting, or a relaxing spa atmosphere. Stonebriar tea light candles will fit any standard tea light or votive holder, or you can even create your own crafty candle holder out of mason jars, wine glasses, and even pieces of wood. These tea light candles can be used for weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, and much more. The opportunities are endless when thinking up new ways to use Stonebriar tea light candles. Tealight candles can be used for floating centerpieces, potpourri warmer, scented wax burner, aromatherapy essential oil burner, tea pot warmer, fondue burner, chaffing dishes, butter warmer, and much more!
feature_bullets: 200 unscented long burning white tea light candles come neatly and tightly shrink-wrapped and packaged in our new and improved protective boxes
Our tea light candles are made with lead free 100% cotton wick for a safe, clean, and smokeless burn
These quality tea candles come with a 6 to 7 hour extended burn time to keep that warm glow going even longer
Stonebriar’s long lasting tea light candles are hand poured in Europe with only the best quality sustainable palm wax
Our candles measure 3/4” height by 1.5” diameter and can be used in any standard heat resistant votive or tea light candle holder

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
